statements: SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customer_contact_information WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_contact_information WHERE email_address LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, phone_number FROM customer_contact_information WHERE payment_updates = TRUE AND promotions = TRUE;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customer_contact_information ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customer_contact_information ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customer_contact_information WHERE payment_updates = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM customer_contact_information ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, phone_number FROM customer_contact_information WHERE promotions = TRUE AND payment_updates = FALSE;
SELECT customer_name, email_address, promotions FROM customer_contact_information WHERE customer_name LIKE '%A%';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, phone_number FROM customer_contact_information WHERE promotions = TRUE OR payment_updates = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM customer_contacts;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_contacts WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customer_contacts ORDER BY first_name DESC;
SELECT communication_type, communication_date, message FROM communication_logs WHERE customer_id = 3 ORDER BY communication_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_contacts WHERE customer_id IN (2, 4);
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_contacts WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT log_id, customer_id, communication_type, communication_date, message FROM communication_logs ORDER BY communication_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_contacts WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT log_id, customer_id, communication_type, communication_date, message FROM communication_logs WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_contacts WHERE customer_id % 2 = 0;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT promotion_name, start_date, end_date FROM promotions WHERE start_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card' ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, CONCAT(first_name, ' ', lastjsonme) AS full_name FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE first_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT promotion_name, start_date, end_date FROM promotions WHERE end_date > DATE('2022-01-01');
SELECT customer_id, first_name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY first_name ASC, phone_number DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT promotion_name, discount FROM promotions WHERE discount > 0;
SELECT customer_id, amount, payment_date FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM communication ORDER BY communication_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT promotion_name, discount FROM promotions WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT name, message FROM customers INNER JOIN communication ON customers.customer_id = communication.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT address_id, street, city, state, postal_code FROM Addresses WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT update_date, payment_status FROM PaymentUpdates ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT promotion_name, start_date, end_date, discount_percent FROM Promotions WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, phone_number FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Addresses WHERE state = 'New York' AND city = 'New York';
SELECT promotion_name, start_date, end_date FROM Promotions WHERE discount_percent > 10 ORDER BY start_date ASC;
